title: Errors, buggs.
body: Stupid error, and im ingame, it bugged ingame, i tried to recc, i bugged in recc, then i restarded client, and cannot go in. Neither from Lap top or computer...rly great losing points, and getting leaver booster... damn . How to fix it ?

replies.body: The login servers need to verify your account, and getting stuck there suggests that something is blocking it from doing so.  If this is the case for you, our [Login Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) guide can help troubleshoot this.
Got same thing at EUNE, it followed the big lag spike session from the game just before that happened
Yes, minions standing at middle, champs moving, but minion bugged totaly. How did you fix it?

still didn't, I'm searching around for similar clues.. to see what's happening

Thought it's because of that earlier problem with EUNE, but now I see you are affected too

Try using vpn, like WTFast, that helped out to me earlier on
